<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>Create Incident</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var body = request.body.data;
    var companyName = body.company;
    var shortDesc = body.short_description;

    var result = {};

    try {
        // Lookup company
        var companyGr = new GlideRecord('core_company');
        companyGr.addQuery('name', companyName);
        companyGr.query();
        gs.info('Domain Indcident API: ' + companyName);
        if (companyGr.next()) {
            // Create new incident
            var inc = new GlideRecord('incident');
            inc.initialize();
            inc.short_description = shortDesc;
            inc.company = companyGr.sys_id;
            inc.sys_domain = companyGr.domain; // domain reference comes from core_company
            inc.insert();
            let correlationId = inc.number;
            gs.info('Domain Indcident API: inserted incident number: ' + correlationId);
            result.status = "success";
            result.incident_sys_id = correlationId;
            result.company = companyName;
            result.domain = companyGr.sys_domain.getDisplayValue();
			
        } else {
            response.setStatus(404);
            result.status = "error";
            result.message = "Company not found: " + companyName;
        }
    } catch (e) {
        response.setStatus(500);
        result.status = "error";
        result.message = e.message;
    }

    response.setBody(result);
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_1778869_domain_0/domain_incident_api/incident</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/incident</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-05 04:19:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>f73ec125c337a25049ccbd0ed40131cb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Domain Aware Incident Integration" source="x_1778869_domain_0">26c274a1c373a25049ccbd0ed401313a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Domain Aware Incident Integration">26c274a1c373a25049ccbd0ed401313a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f73ec125c337a25049ccbd0ed40131cb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-05 04:43:28</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Domain Incident API">e9bdc5e1c337a25049ccbd0ed40131bf</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
